   Open it locally to preview; swap Unsplash placeholders when you get real photos.

ğŸ”¹ Key clarifications & tweaks  
1. ICS / â€œAdd to Calendarâ€  
   â€¢ Acuity â†’ Business Settings â†’ Email Settings â†’ â€œAdd .ics to confirmationâ€ (tick box).  
   â€¢ This auto-attaches a universal calendar file; Google/Apple buttons then appear inside most email clients.

2. Custom confirmation email  
   â€¢ Same menu â†’ customise subject/body.  
   â€¢ Drop your upsell block:  
     â€œNeed pro lighting for just Â£50? Reply â€˜LIGHTâ€™ and weâ€™ll add it.â€

     â€“ Finish package setup + payment prefs.  
     â€“ Copy booking-widget `<iframe>` into `index.html` (replace CTA link when ready).

   â€¢ Auto-reply template (`Gmail â†’ Settings â†’ Advanced â†’ Templates`): includes booking URL + PDF packages.  
   â€¢ Daily digest: simple cron pulling label count >0 and emailing summary to ops inbox.

   git add .
   git commit -m "feat: initial landing page scaffold"
   gh repo create hibiscus-landing --public

   gh repo edit -p gh-pages
